short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will prompt you to donate to the Red Cross.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will prompt you to donate to the Red Cross when the page contains information about natural disasters or illness that require blood donation.
